scripts.build: shx rm -rf dist && tsc && tsc -p tsconfig.decl.json && shx cp src/*.d.ts dist && shx cp src/protobufs/*.d.ts dist/protobufs
scripts.generate-docs: shx rm -rf docs && typedoc --out docs/ && shx touch docs/.nojekyll
scripts.bundle: npm run build && browserify browser/app.js -d -o browser/bundle.js
scripts.preversion: npm run lint && shx rm -rf dist browser/bundle.js && npm run bundle && git add -A browser/bundle.js dist/**
scripts.version: npm run generate-docs && git add -A docs
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && npm publish
